statements: UPDATE transaction_data SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_data SET receiver_address = '456 Main St' WHERE sender_address = '123 Elm St';
UPDATE transaction_data SET amount = 100.50, timestamp = '2022-10-15 14:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 10;
UPDATE transaction_data SET receiver_address = 'New Receiver Address', sender_address = 'Updated Sender Address' WHERE timestamp > '2022-10-01' AND amount >= 500.00;

UPDATE blocks SET transactions = '[{"transaction_id": "6da1cc51-0bff-45d4-a58f-0b5d3a1e1795", "sender_address": "Alice", "receiver_address": "Bob", "amount": 500.57, "timestamp": "2022-11-01T09:30:00Z"}]' WHERE block_id = 'c0dd3f6c-33e8-4a48-8c5b-6191dc63e875';
